entries.journal_entry_description: You met a strange little fellow near one of the Jedi enclave ruins. He told you that he has been having trouble studying the ruins because of a group that call themselves the Blackguard. Perhaps a little forceful negotiations are in order.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Perhaps you can convince the Blackguard to let Dr. Lu examine the ruins if you defeat a few of their members.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Inform Dr. Lu that you have cleared out some of the Blackguard.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Since defeating the Blackguard minions didn't accomplish anything, perhaps it is time to take out one of the leaders. Defeat Vansk of the Blackguard.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Dr. Lu and inform him that you have defeated Vansk of the Blackguard.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Nothing you have done so far has helped Dr. Lu. It is time to strike at the leader of the Blackguard. Defeat San'sii the Kursk in battle.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Return to Dr. Lu and tell him that he should no longer have any problems examining the ruins.
